examples.example: 每天我都会经过那个热闹的地铁站，感受着城市的活力。

translate.english: Every day I will pass by that busy subway station and feel the vitality of the city.

examples.example: 我喜欢在地铁站内观察来来往往的人群，感受生活的美好。

translate.english: I like to observe the people coming and going in the subway station and feel the beauty of life.

examples.example: 我在地铁站里帮助了一位迷路的老人找到正确的出口，心里特别开心。

translate.english: I helped a lost old man find the correct exit in the subway station and was extremely happy in my heart.
